web_endpoint_diagnostic_pipeline.description: Pipeline for web and endpoint diagnostics including HTTP checks, API validation, TCP scanning, and load time measurement.

tcp_service_scan.description: Perform a TCP service scan on a target host.

load_time_measurement.description: Measure the load time of a web page.

dns_resolver_check.description: Check DNS resolution for a domain.

dns_propagation_test.description: Test DNS propagation status for a domain across multiple servers.
